properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST WHERE USER_ID = ? AND NOTICE_NUM = ?
INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( NOTICE_NUM , USER_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? )

SELECT NOTICE_TITLE , C_PRICE , C_CATEGORY , C_SDATE , C_EDATE , C_LOCATION , C_TIME1 , C_TIME2 , ROUTE , CHANGE_NAME FROM WISHLIST W JOIN NOTICE USING (NOTICE_NUM) JOIN CLASS USING (NOTICE_NUM) JOIN TBL_FILE USING (NOTICE_NUM) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_TYPE = '클래스' AND FILE_LEVEL = '0' AND W.USER_ID = ? AND W.NOTICE_NUM = ? ORDER BY W.NOTICE_NUM DESC
